game.name: Barbie In A Mermaid Tale
game.description:
The beautiful mermaid Barbie had got the success of rescuing her mother who is known as the Queen of Ocean Kingdom. The entire kingdom undersea is obliged for her courageous behavior. Today both she and her mother have planned for a party with an objective to enjoy the people of their kingdom after a long time. Barbie doll has planned everything except her outfit. Will help her out in picking up the nice dress for the party? Join Barbie In A Mermaid Tale and show the world your unique fashion designer abilities can impress anyone!

The doll always wonders what would happen if she becomes a mermaid. And, today the time has become when she is playing the role of a daughter of a queen of the underwater kingdom. Your objective is not only to create an awesome outfit for Barbie, but her two close friends are also waiting for her turn. The princess is new to the mermaid stuff, so you have to help her decide the outfits from head to toe in this brand new dressing game for girls. 

Choose from different outfits available in different styles and designs, multiple tale options and jewelry items in this one of the best girls games! Do not forget to complete her look with a suitable hairstyle. Once you complete her look, try to be ready to explore the outfit, tale and jewelry options available for the rest two girls. Create the fabulous dresses for these three girls to have a wonderful party in this html5 mermaid games! Check out more Barbie games for kids on atmegame.com, where no download is required to have fun!
